title: County boards of supervisors: county highways.
subject: Countyboardsofsupervisors
countyhighways

abstracts.abstract:
Existing law requires the authority conferred upon boards of supervisors by certain state laws relating to county highways to be exercised subject to the limitations and restrictions prescribed by those state laws or by other laws, to be in addition to any other authority elsewhere conferred, and, except as otherwise expressly provided, to be exercised only in relation to highways within their respective counties.

This bill would make nonsubstantive changes to these provisions.

actions.description: Introduced. Read first time. To Com. on RLS. for assignment. To print.
From printer. May be acted upon on or after March 21.

extras.impact_clause: An act to amend Section 900 of the Streets and Highways Code, relating to county highways.
